revision.text:
DoomCrap - a Collection of Really Awesome Programs (for Doom)
== Features ==
DoomCrap is three tools in one:
* a font generator (project website [http://doomfontgen.sourceforge.net here]) * a batch image tool * a palette generator
== Download == The whole package is about 6 megs; you can download it [http://baghead.drdteam.org/tools.xml here].
== Information == The utilities are designed to run on both Microsoft Windows and GNU/Linux operating systems. They have been tested on at least Windows XP, Windows Vista, Ubuntu Linux 7.10, and Ubuntu Linux 8.04.
Linux users will need to have Wine and ImageMagick installed in order to use some of the tools in this package. [[Category:Tools]]
